        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Constructs a regular 52-card deck. Initially, the cards are in a sorted order. The shuffle() method can be called to randomize the order.

      • Deck

        public Deck(int i)
        accepts an integer argument and creates a blank deck (used to distinguish from no-args constructor

    • Method Detail

      • freshDeck

        public void freshDeck()
        Create a new collection of 52 cards, in sorted order
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - exits the program in the event that an IllegalArgument happens, such as making a card that has a suit outside of the standard 4 or rank outside of the standard 13

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Determine if Deck is empty
        Overrides:
        isEmpty in class CardPile
        Returns:
        true if there are no more cards, false otherwise
